author: Abhijai Sharma
description: A quick, healthy, and delicious breakfast or snack made with ripe avocado, seasoned to taste, and served on toasted bread â€” perfect for a nutritious start to your day.
ingredients: Optional toppings: cherry tomatoes, radish slices, poached egg, chili flakes, microgreens
instructions: Toast the bread slices until golden and crispy.
Cut the avocado in half, remove the pit, and scoop the flesh into a bowl.
Mash the avocado with a fork until smooth, then mix in lemon juice, salt, and black pepper.
Spread the mashed avocado evenly over the toasted bread slices.
Add any optional toppings you like, such as cherry tomatoes, radish, or a poached egg.
Serve immediately and enjoy your fresh avocado toast!
